content: gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until the last two row your second to last row should be a purl row all you will be able to do is purl the two stitches together on either side of the gap and turn your last row is a knit row slip the first stitch purlwise knit to last 2 stitches ssk them together gusset pick up and knit stitches on side of heel flap with the garter stitch heel you will be picking up the threads between the garter bumps knit the stitches through the back of the stitch twisting to tighten them continue knitting in pattern on instep and then pick up and knit the stitches on the other side knitting through the back again the center back is now where each row starts now begin the decreases which you will continue until you are back to the total of 64 stitches round 1 knit until 3 stitches before the end of needle 2 k2tog k1 continue pattern across needle 1 on needle 2 again k1 ssk knit to center back marker round 2 knit all stitches on needle 2 pattern on needle 1 and all stitches on needle 2 to center back marker continue knitting alternating rounds until you are back to 64 stitches foot continue knitting until desired length for foot i knit until i reach the top of my little toe and then begin the toe shaping toe decreases round 1 knit until 3 stitches before the end of needle 2 k2tog k1 on needle 1 k1 ssk k to 3 stitches before end of needle k2tog k1 on needle 2 k1 ssk k to center back round 2 knit all stitches on needle 2 knit across all stitches on needle 1 and needle 2 to center back marker continue in rounds 1 and 2 until there are a total of 28 stitches 14 on each needle then knit round 1 only until there are a total of 16 stitches 8 on each needle cut a long tail and graft the stitches together weave in ends
